Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Lockwood
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Laramie, Augusta, Central & Chicago, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Lockwood

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Laramie, Augusta, Central and Chicago, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Lockwood. 

Allow extra travel time.
